com.mdc.combot

Class ComBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mdc.combot.ComBot

  • public class ComBot
extends java.lang.Object
    ComBot class. The purpose of the ComBot, or Community Bot, is to be able to combine features from other bots into a single instance.
    Author:
    xDestx

    • Constructor Summary

      Initialize a new ComBot with the provided token.

      • ComBot

        public ComBot(java.lang.String botToken)

        Parameters:
        botToken - The bot user token

      • setPermissionManager

        @Deprecated
public void setPermissionManager(PermissionsInstance p)
        Deprecated. 
        Change the current permissions manager. If isMultiServerOn() evalutes to true, this will have no effect.
        Parameters:
        p - The new manager
        See Also:
        setPermissionManager(PermissionsInstance, String)

      • setPermissionManager

        public void setPermissionManager(PermissionsInstance p,
                                 net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Guild g)
        Set the permission manager for the provided guild. If isMultiServerOn() evaluates to false, this will set the default permission manager.
        Parameters:
        p - PermissionsInstance
        g - The guild

      • setPermissionManager

        public void setPermissionManager(PermissionsInstance p,
                                 java.lang.String guildID)
        Set the permission manager for the provided guild. If isMultiServerOn() evaluates to false, this will set the default permission manager to the provided instance.
        Parameters:
        p - Permissions Instance
        guildID - Guild id

      • sendMessage

        @Deprecated
public void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Deprecated. 
        Sends a message to the default text channel. This method will have no effect when multiserver support is turned on
        Parameters:

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String msg,
                        net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Guild g)
        Send a message to the default text channel in the specified guild. If the guild is null, this will call sendMessage(String message)
        Parameters:
        msg - The message
        g - The guild to send to.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String msg,
                        java.lang.String guildID)
        Send a message to the default text channel in the specified guild. If the provided id doesn't represent a guild or can't be found, the method will revert to sendMessage(String)
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to send
        guildID - The guild ID

      • setBot

        public static boolean setBot(ComBot b)
        Set the current bot. If the bot is already set, this will fail. The current bot must be shutdown first.
        Parameters:
        b - The bot to set
        Returns:
        True, if the bot could be set

      • getBot

        public static ComBot getBot()
        Get the current ComBot running. If there is no bot running, it will return null.
        Returns:
        A bot instance or null
